name: ThEscaping
description: Khm...when u start the game u are a white rectangle ur mission is escape from location with the yellow door some times the door will be have gray color that mean inactive, for open the door u will need a keys also have yellow color like a door, to see how much u need them see upper right there is the key count u need collect for open door,  some times will see a traps and  enemies they have a red color, u know red is red = bad , red =  soviet union a...a...u got it ye!..."ladno po koroche" dont take it srly khm.. all what u will see and they have red color dont touch and  dont lick it this action can kill the player soo.....have fun.(my mission was do hard levels but also possible so u can do it just try).
